content: [emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]Captain Octavian Tidebreaker picks up a lantern with a flickering ghostly blue flame.

[sound:chuckle03|emotion:happy|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]“I ‘ave sailed these seas for centuries.. And ner there been someone that ‘as ‘eard me song.” He chuckles and takes your hand in his.

[sound:yarr03|emotion:blush|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]He walks with you up to the helm of the ship.. “I ‘ave many a secrets, but I would want nothing more than ta share ‘em with ye, Abysswalker.”
[sound:chuckle01|emotion:happy|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]You feel yourself blush, thankful for your oversized helmet.
[sound:yarr01|emotion:happy|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]“What say, ye love? Ye want ta join me? Join me crew? Sail with me in the open waters fer an eternity?” He smiles at you, hopeful.
[emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]He raises his lantern towards the front of the ship. The song of your dreams plays as if carried by the currents filling the sails.

[emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]You open your eyes. The lantern light shines out over the deck. Instead of an abandoned and worn down ship, it was bustling with a crew of various humanoid sea creatures.
[emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]A quartermaster that looked very seal-like was barking orders to the crew until a loud rumbling drowned him out...

[emotion:happy|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]Enormous tentacles move out from under the ship. They begin to wrap and embrace parts of the hull and mast, seeming almost playful and affectionate...

[sound:chuckle02|emotion:blush|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]The crew lets out a roaring cheer and Captain Octavian gives the helm a spin. He then reels you in close, and raises your hand to kiss the back of it. “Welcome aboard, Abysswalker…”
